name: Qualtrax
description: On-premise & cloud-based quality management tool that helps businesses of all sizes manage and control documentation, compliance, workflows, employees training, purchase request automation & more.
solutions: We prepared the main User flows using FlowMap
Re-designed the app using UX/UI best practices
outcome: Using vast experience with UI/UX, we introduced a drastic improvement to the main User Flows. The application design became more intuitive and user-friendly.
